description.translate: Nothing is more pleasant than feeling free from the forces of gravity.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Nonchalance Somniophage\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Rien de plus agréable que de ne plus\"}","{\"text\":\"§7se sentir soumis, aux forces de la gravité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Nothing is more pleasant than feeling free\"}","{\"text\":\"§7from the forces of gravity.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a2 §7SPD§a2 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
